textBox.richText: I loved teaching high school history, but it was exhausting for me because I wanted to do everything right. It was like swimming up river. I spent hundreds of hours searching for resources, collecting links and books and videos, and trying to find the best stuff I could. Here I have collected as many resources as I could find that are actually useful to the classroom history teacher. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated - please email me with them. Also, I just fixed the email links on all the pages (I think), so it should work better now. The RSS feed is still broken, as is the google search on each page. I’ll work on getting those up and running as soon as I can. Links for Teacher Tools & Downloads Teaching - main topic page E-Mail Me
